turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order three large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need gluten-free crust on all three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just confirm the order and tell me when they're ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering 3 large gluten free crust pizzas with broccoli and pineapple, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Confirm total and the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm picking them up. Confirm the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.
